intro:
Color delicious foods with your crayons!
Create sweet desserts and tasty dishes by hand.
Bring your food art to life with realistic crayon textures!
description:
Crayon Food is the newest entry in the Crayon series after Crayon Car, Crayon Dinosaur, and Crayon Halloween.
This time, a world of delicious food comes to life in color!
Cupcakes, pizza, gimbap, ice cream — color them your way!
Enjoy coloring peacefully alone or share the fun with family and friends.
Collect your finished food art and create your own colorful recipe book!
